casebody.data:
REGENCY CENTERS ACQUISITION, LLC
v.
CRESCENT ACQUISTIONS, LLC 134A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 13, 2018 Mark E. Anderson, Tracy S. DeMarco, Raleigh, Attorneys at Law, for Regency Centers Acquisitions, LLC Kiran H. Mehta, Sara S. Ash, Attorneys at Law, Charlotte, for Crescent Acquisitions, LLC

*357The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 11th of July 2018 by Plaintiff:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of July 2018."

Plaintiff shall have up to and including the 13th day of August 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
